trans-unit.source: Represents the center panel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> control.

You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> to hold controls other than these.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` to enable automatic scrolling; otherwise, `false`.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The minimum size of the auto-scroll.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` to enable automatic sizing; otherwise, `false`.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The mode by which the content panel automatically resizes itself.

Overridden to ensure that the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> reflects the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` if the control causes validation; otherwise, `false`.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
Occurs when the content panel loads.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The size that is the upper limit that GetPreferredSize can specify.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The size that is the lower limit that GetPreferredSize can specify.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The name of the control.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, which contains all the information necessary to render the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> used to customize the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> that handles painting.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Renderer"></xref> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets or sets the painting styles to be applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode"></xref> values.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The tab order of the control within its container.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> can be tabbed to; otherwise, `false`.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
